com.radirius.mercury.graphics
Class FrameBuffer

java.lang.Object
  com.radirius.mercury.graphics.FrameBuffer

public class FrameBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for post-processing effects.

Author:
wessles
